original_text: I was very happy when Stephanas, Fortunatus and Achaicus arrived here. You could not be here yourselves, but they have taken your place.
korean_text: 내가 스데바나와 브드나도와 아가이고가 온 것을 기뻐하노니 그들이 너희의 부족한 것을 채웠음이라

sentences.original_text: when Stephanas, Fortunatus and Achaicus arrived here
sentences.korean_translation: 스데바나, 포르투나투스, 그리고 아가이코가 여기에 도착했을 때

sentences.original_text: You could not be here yourselves
sentences.korean_translation: 너희는 직접 여기에 올 수 없었지만

sentences.original_text: but they have taken your place
